text: Tumhare liye samandar ka shikar aur uska khana halaal kardiya gaya, jahan tum thehro wahan bhi usey kha sakte ho aur kafilay(travellers) ke liye zaad-e-raah bhi bana sakte ho. Albatta khushki(land) ka shikar jab tak tum ehram ki halat mein ho tumpar haraam kiya gaya hai. Pas bacho us khuda ki nafarmani se jiski peshi mein tum sabko gher kar haazir kiya jayega
